question: What was the surname of the woman who was the inspiration behind the Rolling Stones song Angie?
vanilla_rag_result: The surname of the woman who claimed to be the inspiration behind the Rolling Stones song "Angie" is Bowie. Her full name is Angie Bowie. However, it is important to note that the songwriters Mick Jagger and Keith Richards have denied that the song was inspired by her.
